long_description: Featuring a retractable wire and a tough metal frame, the Bakoda Micro ski lock provides extra security for your skis when you make a pit stop at the lodge or while you enjoy some apres-ski fun. Easily packable micro design measures 3 x 2 x 0.75 in. Resettable combination.
short_description: Featuring a retractable wire and a tough metal frame, the Bakoda Micro ski lock provides extra security for your skis when you make a pit stop at the lodge or while you enjoy some apres-ski fun.
